overview: Late for her first day of work, Verronica blames her boyfriend for the delay. When that excuse doesn't work for Abigail, she makes her to make her learn.  Office temp Kenzie is working late to impress her boss so she can become full-time. When Angela tells her she can help her get in good, she's intrigued, but what does she have to do?  Bored at work, Lyra and Kate head out to the warehouse for some "personal time". Angela catches them, but when the tables are turned, Angela has no choice but to join in.  Divorce lawyer Brett meets her new client Sabina who just found out she's been cheated on. Brett makes her comfortable then does a physical evaluation.
tagline: Honey, trust me you'll get the job!
title: Lesbian Office Tales
